channel.title: Crypted-Online Devolution V7 Source
channel.description:
This is my dodian server, please, post away on ideas, suggestions, and comments. :D
Ice Queen, outside home near chickens Drops: Crystal bow, shield, and ice gloves: [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/icequeen.jpg[/img]
KBD 1 and 2: 1 in Dragon Caves, and 1 in Wildy: Level 90 Ancient Teleport: Drops: Dragon armor and weapons [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/kbd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/kbd2.jpg[/img]
Added shops: 1 is pking items, and skilling items, and other is skillcapes (99 or not) [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/newshop1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/newshop2.jpg[/img]
::mageboss 25k HP Drops: Mystic Mud Staff, and Lava Battlestaff [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/mageboss.jpg[/img]
::meleeboss 25k HP Drops: Zerker, Warrior, and Anger Sword: [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/meleeboss.jpg[/img]
::rangeboss 25 HP Drops: Ranger boots, Robin Hood Hat, and Seercull: [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/rangeboss.jpg[/img]
::noobtrain Skellies drop skelly armor, coins, glory, and obby cape. Guards drop rune stuff. General drops white and gilded stuff. [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/noobtrain1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/mattz1996/noobtrain2.jpg[/img]
Removed ::master. Made ::Starter mod only.
Also added today:
Kill Black Knight Titan to get purple key, and type ::rareboss. Kill him for a chance to get a partyhat, a mask, a pumpkin, or a pirate hat, or 2% chance of a Legends cape!

This is my dodian server, please, post away on ideas, suggestions, and comments.
